languages.text: "Помиловать. Еретические символы отмыть и отпустить к семье".
"Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."
languages.original_text: "Помиловать. Еретические символы отмыть и отпустить к семье".

traits.locale_text: "Spare the man. Wash off the heretical symbols and let him join his family."
"Spare the man. Wash off the heretical symbols and let him join his family."
"Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."
"Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."
"Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."
"Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."

languages.text: « Épargnez-le. Débarrassez-le de ces symboles impies et renvoyez-le auprès des siens. »
languages.original_text: "Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."

traits.locale_text: « Épargnez-le. Débarrassez-le de ces symboles impies et renvoyez-le auprès des siens. »

languages.text: «Perdonen al hombre. Lávenle estos símbolos herejes y dejen que se reúna con su familia».
languages.original_text: "Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."

traits.locale_text: «Perdonen al hombre. Lávenle estos símbolos herejes y dejen que se reúna con su familia».

languages.text: “放过这个人，洗掉那些异端符号，让他和他的家人团聚。”
languages.original_text: "Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."

traits.locale_text: “放过这个人，洗掉那些异端符号，让他和他的家人团聚。”

languages.text: 「あの男を助けてやれ。その異端の印を洗い流し、家族のもとに戻らせなさい」
languages.original_text: "Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."

traits.locale_text: 「あの男を助けてやれ。その異端の印を洗い流し、家族のもとに戻らせなさい」

languages.text: "Verschont den Mann. Wascht diese ketzerischen Symbole ab und lasst ihn zurück zu seiner Familie gehen."
languages.original_text: "Spare the man. Wash off those heretical symbols and let him rejoin his family."

traits.locale_text: "Verschont den Mann. Wascht diese ketzerischen Symbole ab und lasst ihn zurück zu seiner Familie gehen."
